translations: 能说两种语言的人（bilingual 的复数）

phrs.translation: 双语词典；双语对照词典

sentences.sentence: "Bilinguals can pay focused attention without being distracted and also improve in the ability to switch from one task to another," says Sorace.
sentences.translation: 索瑞斯说：“双语者可以集中注意力而不分心，不同任务间进行切换的能力也有所提高。”

sentences.sentence: We wondered, "Are bilinguals better at multitasking?"
sentences.translation: 我们想知道“双语者在同时处理多项任务是不是更胜任？”

sentences.sentence: So we put monolinguals and bilinguals into a driving simulator.
sentences.translation: 这样，我们让单语者和双语者模拟驾车。
